description: TypeScript SDK for Sharetribe Flex Marketplace API and Integration API with full type safety, cross-platform support, and built-in token management.
rules: Use SharetribeSdk for client-side/frontend operations and IntegrationSdk for server-side/backend operations
IntegrationSdk requires clientSecret and should NEVER be used in browser environments
Always use sdkTypes (Money, UUID, LatLng, etc.) for proper Transit serialization
Money amounts are in smallest currency units (e.g., cents for USD)
Use ExpressStore with httpOnly=true for production server applications
